bibl.title: De pied en cap - A Shoe from Dios and a Hat from Domitianè / Kainè Latomia, in the Eastern Desert of Egypt.
bibl.note: 1. The praesidia of the Eastern Desert of Egypt: new mines of archaeological textiles. - 2. Discoveries in their context: Dios and Domitianè / Kainè Latomia. - 3. Dios and the slipper / sock [Dios 4635.1 (inv. 646), after AD 115 and before AD 245]. - 4. Domitianè / Kainè Latomia and the felt hat [Domitianè / Kainè Latomia 2003.2101.4, end of the 1st century AD].

bibl.title: assisted by Elisabeth Ehler, Dress Accessories of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt. Proceedings of the 6th Conference of the Research Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 2-3 October 2009.

bibl.seg: Cardon Dominique, Hélène Cuvigny and Dany Nadal, De pied en cap - A Shoe from Dios and a Hat from Domitianè / Kainè Latomia, in the Eastern Desert of Egypt.

Antoine De Moor and Cäcilia Fluck (Edd.), assisted by Elisabeth Ehler, Dress Accessories of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt. Proceedings of the 6th Conference of the Research Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 2-3 October 2009 (Tielt, 2011) pp. 44-53, 14 figg. coul.

1. The praesidia of the Eastern Desert of Egypt: new mines of archaeological textiles. - 2. Discoveries in their context: Dios and Domitianè / Kainè Latomia. - 3. Dios and the slipper / sock [Dios 4635.1 (inv. 646), after AD 115 and before AD 245]. - 4. Domitianè / Kainè Latomia and the felt hat [Domitianè / Kainè Latomia 2003.2101.4, end of the 1st century AD].
